definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
weaponry/to hold (a weapon)/to wield/to rely on/to depend on/war/battle

sentences.english: I expected them to fight but they went back to grazing after a minute of posturing.
sentences.chinese: 我希望它們幹仗但是它們回到喫草在一分鐘的姿態。

sentences.english: The two of you are always fighting.
